hero.name: Johnny Solano
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer specialized in scalable architectures for web, mobile, and desktop environments

about.title: About Me
about.description: Software engineer with experience in design, development, and technical leadership of full stack solutions for web, desktop, and mobile environments.
about.approach: My approach combines the definition of scalable architectures, the implementation of technical standards, and the optimization of business processes through technological best practices.
about.teamwork: Accustomed to working under agile methodologies and coordinating with multiple teams, providing strategic vision and execution capacity to ensure solutions aligned with corporate objectives.
about.experienceDesc: Full Stack Developer at Synapptica S.A
about.educationDesc: B.Sc. Systems Engineering (CyberSecurity) | Bachelor's in Business Informatics

sinapsis.title: Sinapsis
sinapsis.description: Enterprise platform for HR, inventory, logistics, billing (including tax compliance), accounting, and payroll. Developed with .NET MVC, IIS, Kendo UI, Node.js, SQL Server, and Ionic Angular for mobile.

uci.title: UCI Web Platform
uci.description: React (JSX) web platform for academic records management, admissions, and digital content. Fully responsive and optimized user experience.

municipalidad.title: Administrative Procedures System
municipalidad.description: Web system for workflow and document management, role-based access, and dynamic PDF generation for administrative processes.

kontena.title: Kontena
kontena.description: Logistics platform for container management, monitoring, and inspection with .NET MVC, Kendo UI, Node.js, SQL Server, and Ionic Angular mobile app.

qmatic.title: Custom Survey Platform Qmatic
qmatic.description: Responsive web platform developed with React JS, JSX, and Vite for custom customer survey management. Implemented robust security integration with authentication tokens, unique identifiers, cookies, and standard security best practices.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities.
